attributes.action: Introduce National Service for all immigrants, persons recieving a ASBO and all persons leaving school pre-university service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please instate national service for all immigrants wishing to reside in the United Kingdom, as a sign of their good faith to the Queen and country.

Also include all persons receiving an ASBO (Anti-Social Behavior Order.

Further to this include all persons leaving school at either 16 or 18 compulsory National service.

This would go some way to achieving cohesion between cultures and religions, reduction in youth crime, and install a sense of pride back into our nation. Youth's required to attend pre-university due to record levels of students failing to complete degrees.

I realize that there are other National service petitions however this one covers all areas in one.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
